sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>After making a successful attack when using a non-starship vehicle weapon, the character may spend one Destiny Point to add damage equal to the character's Willpower to one hit of the successful attack.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Deathblow</name> <number>TAL0001316</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-19 04:34:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>075ec98c2f030d10e0f497eef699b6f4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-10 17:04:28</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
